user.title: ESC Easy Sensor Creation
user.description: What type of sensor would you like to create?

kwh_config.title: Create kWh Sensor
kwh_config.description: Select the power sensor (in W or kW) to integrate. A native Home Assistant Riemann sensor (helper) will be created, ideal for the Energy Dashboard. You'll find it under **Settings > Devices & Services > Helpers** after creation.

data.sensor_name: Name of the new kWh Sensor

battery_mode.title: Select Battery Mode
battery_mode.description: Does your sensor provide positive (charge) or negative (discharge) values? The W sensor will filter accordingly, and a Riemann kWh helper will be created.

battery_sensor.title: Select Power Sensor for Battery
battery_sensor.description: Choose the sensor with values (can be positive/negative).

select_sensors.title: Select Sensors for Sum
select_sensors.description: Select multiple sensors whose values should be added. Ensure all have the same unit of measurement.

data.source_sensors: Which sensors do you want to add?

select_single_sensor.title: Select Sensor for Statistics
select_single_sensor.description: Select the sensor that will serve as the basis for the statistic calculation.

select_delta_sensor.title: Select Sensor for Delta
select_delta_sensor.description: Select the sensor for the trend comparison.

delta_period.title: Select Delta Period
delta_period.description: Over which time period should the comparison run?

select_sql_stat_type.title: Select Statistic Type
select_sql_stat_type.description: Which statistic would you like to calculate?

binary_threshold.title: Configure Binary Threshold
binary_threshold.description: Create an alarm that turns on when the value is above/below a threshold.

toggle_target.title: Configure Toggle Target
toggle_target.description: Select the entity you want to pause/reset.

sfml_config.title: Create SFML Sensors
sfml_config.description:
Select the DC power sensor of your solar panels. 3 sensors will be created automatically:
- **Power Sensor** (W, positive values only)
- **Yield Sensor** (kWh, Riemann integration)
- **Daily Yield** (kWh, daily reset at midnight)

sfml_panel_count.title: SFML Panel Groups
sfml_panel_count.description: How many panel groups/strings do you want to configure?

sfml_panel_config.title: Panel Group {current} of {total}
sfml_panel_config.description:
Configure the panel group. 3 sensors will be created:
- **Power** (W)
- **Yield** (kWh total)
- **Daily Yield** (kWh/day)

device_class.title: Classify Sensor
device_class.description: Would you like to classify your sensor? This helps Home Assistant display the correct icon and format.

name_sensor.title: Name Sensor
name_sensor.description: What should your new sensor be called?

error.name_exists: A helper with this name already exists. Please choose a different name.

abort.kwh_helper_created: Your kWh sensor has been created. You'll find it under Helpers.
